content: Lassi Paunonen | Tampere universitiesLassi PaunonenProfessor, matematiikkaFaculty of Information Technology and Communication Sciences | Computing SciencesTampere Universitylassi.paunonen [at] tuni.fi (lassi[dot]paunonen[at]tuni[dot]fi)phone number+358504479282Hervanta CampusOrcidhttps://orcid.org/0000-0001-6497-4718Websiteshttps://sysgrouptampere.wordpress.com/About meI am the leader of the Systems Theory Research Group (in mathematics) in the ITC faculty. My research interests especially include functional analysis, operator theory, theory of infinite-dimensional linear systems and robust control, stability of strongly continuous semigroups. The main homepages of my research group and myself, as well as the Youtube and Instagram accounts can be found in the following addresses: Research group homepage: https://sysgrouptampere.wordpress.com/ Personal homepage: https://lassipaunonen.wordpress.com/ Youtube account (teaching): Lassi Paunonen Teaching Youtube account (group): Systems Theory Research Group Instagram account (professional): https://www.instagram.com/paunonen_math/ Fields of expertiseFunctional analysis, operator theory, theory of infinite-dimensional linear systems and robust control, stability of strongly continuous semigroups.
